review: My mother had met the doctor and it was for knee pain issue. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. There was more waiting time when we went. The concern was there was no one in reception in ortho department. It was for 30 -45 minutes we waited. ******* **** ********** ** *** ****** *** ** *** *********. Hospital infrastructure has to be improved. They should be more responsive. Scanning and X-ray was done. My mom was in 3rd stage of arthritis, life style changes was suggested like what to eat. Doctor was very friendly. Knee pain is reduced 70 percent for her. Doctor told it's not 100 percent possible based on medical condition.

My husband had cervical spinal related issue so went to hospital. ********* *** ********* ** *** ******* I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was no waiting time in the hospital. X-ray was done. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Physiotherapy was suggested and doctor was friendly. Staff were very cooperative.

My wife had been to hospital and it was for shoulder pain related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. Doctor was experienced and very patient. There was less waiting time in the hospital.  It was 10-15 minutes. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Doctor was friendly.

My husband had met the doctor and it was for health problem. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people.  There was waiting time in the hospital when we went. He met with accident. Normal exercise was suggested.

My mom had been to hospital and it was for ortho related. Doctor was good in consulting me. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. There was no waiting time in the hospital. We are happy with doctor.
I booked the appointment for myself as I was having health issue I would give 2 stars for the consultation I was asked to do some tests I have checked all the reports on myself
I booked the appointment for myself as I was having some health issue the consultation was very good it was a good experience I am satisfied with the consultation

My wife had consulted the doctor and it was for back pain. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. There was some waiting time in the hospital. We went for second opinion. Doctor was friendly.

review: He is a very kind doctor, easily approachable and knowledgeable. Has Good experience in his particular field. Met him after 6 years and still recognised us. A very nice doctor.
